description.p: Islamic prayer times (Adhan) and Qur'an application that is highly customizable, free and open source.
If you encounter a bug, want to add a language, want to contribute or just want to say Salam, join our discord server or subreddit!
Keywords: Athan, Adhan, Azan, Islam, Muslim, Prayers, times, Muezzin, Salah, Salat, Namaz, Islamic, Hijri, Quran, Qur'an, Koran.
Assalamou Alaykoum brothers/sisters and Ramadan Moubarak once again

ul.li: Progress bar indicating time left until prayer.
Custom Adhan for Fajr is now available (suggested by @iFarhaan).
New default Adhan by Ahmed Al-Nufeis
Qur'an audio enabled (per verse with auto-play and auto-scroll or individually).
Qur'an reader now shows a Bismillah line before the Surah.
Pages titles changes depending on the language.
Added welcome message in terminal as well as time left until prayer.
File inputs are now shown as buttons (much prettier Alhamdoulillah).
Fixed a bug that made calculation methods reset after each restart of the app (noticed by @iFarhaan)
Fixed bug where 1 page of the Qur'an was not loaded.
Window is now not hidden upon minimizing. (suggested by @iFarhaan)

description.p: If there is any problem, please contact me so that I can fix it. If you have any ideas, I'd gladly hear them. Jazzakoum Allahu khairan.
